•Without head, gizzard and innards and feet

Cooking Instructions: Baking: Preheat oven to 180°C. On a baking tray, on a bed of vegetables of your choice, place the bird (breast down) and bake in oven till golden brown. Remove from oven, cover with tin foil and bake again, while occasionally checking if cooked through by piercing the meat of the thigh (most meaty part).
On the Hob: In a heavy bottom pot, cook your choice of vegetables in cooking oil or butter. Place the marinated bird breast down and cover with stock. Place a lid on and simmer for an hour and a half on a low flame or till cooked through.

Ideal Cooking Time: 90-120 minutes

product_merchantdising.short_description:
Sustainably farm-reared and humanely treated country chicken of full-bodied flavour; uncorrupted by growth promoters, pesticides and antibiotic residues, to ensure higher nutritional value in every bite. Being the more mature and gamey variety, it has a tougher texture and requires to be cooked for longer. Buy Country Chicken online from Licious for the authentic rustic flavours of the country-side.

product_merchantdising.description: Considered the supreme fish in every Bengali home, this fish defines grandeur. Taste the authentic flavour of the Eastern freshwaters with this Bengali-style cut pieces of rich and flavourful Hilsa. Be consumed by the buttery texture and palatable oily taste that sets this fish apart and offers it its royalty status among fishes.
product_merchantdising.short_description:
A classic Bengali delicacy, Hilsa makes a great mustard curry and spicy fried side.
We serve a whole fish cut into 8-10 pcs per kilo. Average weight per fish is 1kg to 1.2 Kg.

An oily fish rich in Omega 3 fatty acids, the Hilsa fish is considered to be the “king of fish” owing to its high nutritional value and unique taste. This fresh water fish is soft textured with a pleasant scent and is laden in polyunsaturated fatty acids that give off a distinct, delicate oily aftertaste.

Ideal Cooking time: 20-25 minutes

product_merchantdising.description: The cut that is in a league of its own. The tenderloin of chicken, Chicken Supreme is the ultimate melt-in-your-mouth indulgence. A premier cut of chicken closest to the inner breast bone, it has a delicate texture being the most inactive part of the chicken, and hence offers a soft, juicy bite with the ability to become a habit waiting to be made.
product_merchantdising.short_description:
100% antibiotic-residue free and hormone-free

The tenderloin of chicken, Chicken Supreme is the cut of meat closest to the inner breast bone. Being the most inactive part of the chicken, it is the tenderest cut of meat which hasn’t been ‘worked’ in any way. A premier cut of chicken it has a delicate texture and offers a juicy, soft bite.

Nutrition: Chicken Supreme is laden with Niacin, a Vitamin B3 variant that drives the food to fuel conversion in the body, also, it is a great nutrient for healthy skin, hair and liver. The Niacin in Chicken Supreme aids the increase in HDL which helps alleviate cholesterol problems therefore making it a part of most nutritionist recommended diets.

No. of pieces: 13-16 strips

Minimum Cooking Time: 15-20 minutes

Cooking Methods: Best suited for stir frying, poaching, baking, barbecuing

product_merchantdising.description:
Enjoy a toothsome celebratory feast this season with fresh, not frozen, whole turkey raised on all-natural farms, cleaned with skin on, ready to be marinated offering you the softest bite of fresh turkey you would keep wanting for.
 Without head, gizzard and innards and feet.
product_merchantdising.short_description:
Enjoy a toothsome celebratory feast this season with fresh, not frozen, whole turkey raised on all-natural farms, cleaned with skin on, ready to be marinated offering you the softest bite of fresh turkey you would keep wanting for.
 Without head, gizzard and innards and feet.

Cooking Instructions:
Baking: Preheat oven to 180°C. On a baking tray, on a bed of vegetables of your choice, place the bird (breast down) and bake in oven till golden brown. Remove from oven, cover with tin foil and bake again, while occasionally checking if cooked through by piercing the meat of the thigh (most meaty part).
On the Hob: In a heavy bottom pot, cook your choice of vegetables in cooking oil or butter. Place the marinated bird breast down and cover with stock. Place a lid on and simmer for an hour and a half on a low flame or till cooked through.

Ideal Cooking Time: 90-120 minutes

Gentle flavours of Salami get their chance to shine with the presence of sizzling spicy notes.

The spicy notes allow the gentle flavour of salami to shine on its own. It is a delicious addition to sandwiches, salads or had plain on its own with a slice of cheese.

All our cured meats are Gluten free
product_merchantdising.meta_title: Fresh Chicken Salami with Chilli! Order on Licious today.
product_merchantdising.meta_description: Now, shop for the freshest Chicken Salami cuts with Cholli online! Order online today.
product_merchantdising.meta_keywords: buy chicken salami With chilli Online chicken salami with chilli chicken salami with chilli
product_merchantdising.usp_desc: Gluten-free salami made from freshly minced chicken mixed with natural spices
product_merchantdising.msite_desc: Gluten-free salami made from fresh chicken mixed with spices minced, steamed, sliced into slabs offering a hot-tasting bite ideal for quick lunches or party hors d'oeuvre. Serve with your choice of dipping sauce.

product_merchantdising.description: Your chicken curry essential to be. Half a chicken cut to bite-sized pieces including one leg, a wing without the tip, one breast quarter with backbone. A complementary mix of both white and dark, skinned, bone-in meat, Chicken Curry cut is ideal to get a taste of soft and comparatively tougher meat all packed into one dish.
product_merchantdising.short_description:
100% antibiotic-residue free and hormone-free

Half a chicken cut to bite-sized pieces including one leg, a wing without the tip, one breast quarter with backbone. A complementary mix of both white and dark, skinned, bone-in meat, Chicken Curry cut is ideal to get a taste of soft and comparatively tougher meat all packed in one dish.

No. of pieces: 11-14 pieces

Minimum Cooking Time: 25-30 minutes

Cooking Methods: Best suited for currying
product_merchantdising.meta_description: Prime meat from carefully chosen tender chickens weighing not more than 1.2 kg. The meat is so tender it falls easily off the bone.
product_merchantdising.usp_desc: Bone-in chunky pieces of skinless meat including one leg, wing without tip, & breast quarter
product_merchantdising.msite_desc: One half  of a prime, certified healthy chicken cut into bite-sized pieces with one leg, a wing without tip, breast quarter with backbone. Skinned and with bone in, it presents the taste of premium grade meat that’s a quintessential Indian staple.

product_merchantdising.description: The ultimate breakfast club inductee. Classic white shelled eggs with a pale yellow yolk laid naturally by healthy chickens for a flavour boost to any meal. The humane raising of our chickens and natural processing conditions, impart a richer and more sharp-tasting flavour to our eggs.
product_merchantdising.short_description:
Classic white shelled eggs with a pale yellow yolk laid naturally by healthy chickens for a flavour boost to any meal. The humane raising of our chickens and natural processing conditions, impart a richer and more sharp-tasting flavour to our eggs. </br></br>
From chickens free of any growth enhancers, our eggs are classic in every way with no hormones, no chemicals, just 100% natural goodness and wholesome flavour.</br></br>
All our eggs are sanitised before packing.</br></br>
No. of pieces: 6
